players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, I think Alice might be the mafioso because Diana was killed last night and Alice is acting suspiciously."
You: "Charlie, I think Bob is the detective because he's been asking too many questions and Diana was killed last night."

Charlie: "

"
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso because she was acting suspiciously last night and Diana was killed."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't think you're the detective because Diana was killed last night and he would have protected her."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, I think Alice might be the mafioso because Diana was killed last night and Alice is acting suspiciously."
Alice: "Charlie, I think Bob is the detective because he's been asking too many questions and Diana was killed last night."

Charlie: "

"
You: "I think Alice is the mafioso because she was acting suspiciously last night and Diana was killed."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't think you're the detective because Diana was killed last night and he would have protected her."
Alice: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
